mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(recruit_taster_biz_code,'_', 1),'_',LPAD(CAST(MAX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(recruit_taster_biz_code,'_',-1))AS DECIMAL)+1,4,0)), 'rtb_0001') AS newCode FROM tb_taster_recruit_biz

SELECT t.recruit_taster_biz_code , t.store_code , t.biz_id , t.recruit_title , t.questions_title , t.question_cate_code , t.special_question_cate , t.request_date , t.recruit_num_total , t.recruit_num_now , t.menu_code , t.recruit_fin_time , t.state_code , t.admin_id , t.age_code , m.menu_name , s.store_name FROM tb_taster_recruit_biz AS t INNER JOIN tb_store_menu AS m ON t.menu_code = m.menu_code INNER JOIN tb_store_info AS s ON t.store_code = s.store_code
t.recruit_taster_biz_code = #{recruitCode}
